state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Corridor =- You arrive in a corridor. An ordinary kind of place. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, there is no door. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is not blocked by one. There is an exit to the west. > -= Corridor =-0/1
next_state: -= Bedroom =- You find yourself in a bedroom. A standard one. You can barely contain your excitement. You make out a bed. The bed is large. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is not blocked by one. > -= Bedroom =-0/2

admissible_commands: put red bell pepper on bed
put red hot pepper on bed
